Flow.interviewLabel: Create Internal Project AH Project Backlog Record {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Create Internal Project AH Project Backlog Record

recordCreates.name: Create_Process_Improvement_NI_Project_Backlog_Record
recordCreates.label: Create Process Improvement NI Project Backlog Record

fields.name: BenefitsDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Select the category or categories below representing benefits your project will bring to the organization.


Please note when selecting Increase Revenue, Improve the Customer Experience categories youll be required to enter corresponding quantifiable numbers and other supporting information. This is not required for Legal or Security Compliance, but please do indicate any benefits if they exist.


If your project has cost savings and/or benefits related to efficiencies, youll be asked later in the Wizard to enter the corresponding quantifiable numbers.

fields.name: CorporateInitiativeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Corporate Initiatives are assigned to project records and are utilized for reporting purposes. They provide a way to easily group projects that are related or part of a program, in reports and dashboards. 

 

Select the Corporate Initiative code for your project. If youre unsure or this doesnt apply, select None.

fields.name: DisplayTextHPO_0
fields.fieldText:
Hospitality Process Owners are responsible for understanding value stream processes and ensuring requests dont present negative consequences to any specific area of the business.  Please reach out to them with any questions related to your request.

To view current Hospitality Process Owners, please click here.


Upon successfully completing the intake Wizard, a project record is created for your request.  

  • All projects receive a ranking based on the benefits information you provide, regardless of size or systems impact.  
  • Projects requiring Corporate Business Systems resources are reviewed and sized weekly; upon completion of sizing a corresponding Business Systems project record is created and linked to the Process Improvement project record.  
  • All requests are subsequently worked on based on ranking and availability of resources.

fields.name: ImpactedRegionDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select the region impacted by your project.

fields.name: ImpactedSystemsDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select the platforms that are impacted by your request. If you are not sure if any platforms listed below are impacted, do not select any and click Next.

fields.name: Impacted_Systems
fields.helpText:
CI: Cast Iron integration platform used in the TravelClick Landscape

EBS: Oracle billing solution used in the TravelClick Landscape

Insite: Insite system used in the TravelClick Landscape

SF - AH Org: Hospitality Salesforce Org

SF - TC Org: TravelClick Salesforce Org

Zuora: Zuora billing and CPQ solution used in the TravelClick Landscape

fields.name: Additional_Information
fields.fieldText: Please Describe How The Customer Experience Will Be Improved (255 character limit)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please limit your description to 255 characters or less.

fields.name: IncreaseRevenueDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Revenue Benefit in US Dollars

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimated Annual Revenue Increase must be greater than 0

fields.name: RevenueIncreaseDetailsInput
fields.fieldText: How Did You Arrive At This Number?

validationRule.errorMessage: The Confidence % must be greater than 0 and cannot be greater than 100

screens.description: This screen shows to the user when they do not select a valid value for Organizational Impact in the last screen.
screens.name: OrganizationalImpactErrorScreen
screens.label: OrganizationalImpactErrorScreen

fields.name: OrgImpactErrorScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The value you selected for Organizational Impact is invalid. Please return to the previous screen to choose a valid selection.

fields.name: Operational
fields.fieldText:
Choose the Organizational Impact for this request


Transform:

  • Establishes strategy;move forward future thinking & has impact to wider audience; top-down driven
  • Typically presents high risk if not executed
  • Transforms significant processes and/or creates critical functions

Grow:

  • Purposeful; connects to sustainable processes; supports strategic or compliance related initiatives
  • Typically presents medium to high business risk (if not executed)
  • Enhances critical functions (work smarter day to day)

Enhancement:

  • Addresses immediate needs (i.e., "band aids"; bottom-up driven)
  • Typically presents low to no business risk (if not executed)
  • Addresses efficiencies (reduces touch time & non-value add steps); day to day mentality

fields.name: Finish
fields.fieldText:
Click Next to create your Internal Project Request


The priority assigned to your project can be viewed in a Salesforce Dashboard, on the project record, in object List Views and is a reportable field. 


If your project will/may involve Corporate Business Systems development, it will be sized. 


All Grow and Transform requests are forwarded for approval to the Sponsor youve indicated. Please note requests with benefits greater than $500,000 also require approval from Finance and the appropriate P&L owner from Product.


As the owner of this record, you are responsible for integrity of the data (for tracking and reporting purposes) and assigning an implementation owner (if other than yourself).

Thank you!

fields.name: BusinessCaseDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Provide a title and description of your project. The description should include how the expected benefits were determined and what pain point/problem you are trying to solve.


Once your project is created, details supporting how the expected benefits were calculated (i.e., excel spreadsheets, other documents can be attached to the project record in Quip/Files)

validationRule.errorMessage: The Project Title needs to be 80 characters or less. Please adjust your Project Title before continuing.

screens.description: If creation of the AH Project record fails, this screen will alert the user and display the error message preventing the creation of the record.
screens.name: ProjectBacklogFaultScreen
screens.label: ProjectBacklogFaultScreen

fields.name: ProjectBacklogFaultDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Your Project Backlog record cannot be created at this time. Please review the error message below for issues that need to be resolved or contact your system administrator for assistance.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Click Previous to return to the wizard to correct your information. Click the Previous button on each screen until you find the screen that needs to be fixed.

fields.name: DisplayTextRequestedCompletionDate
fields.fieldText:
The below information only applies if youre requesting system enhancements. Click Next if it doesnt apply. 


While well try to meet your requested completion time-frame, our ability to do so is based on both the priority of your request and the resource capacity of the CBS Team. This means it may or may not be delivered by the date you request.

fields.name: Requested_Completion_Date
fields.fieldText: Requested Completion Date for CBS Related Work

fields.name: SolutionDomainDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
If your project includes back-office impacts associated with implementing a new customer product, making changes to an existing customer product, or other produce related changes, select the appropriate Solution Domain/Product Line.


Select Transversal if your project impacts multiple Solution Domains

fields.name: SponsorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Select the sponsor for your project. A sponsor is the individual held accountable for the success of the project and is typically a department VP or higher.


For all Transform and Grow Projects, once the Process Improvement Project has been created and is sized by Corporate Business Systems (if applicable), an automated approval request will be sent to the Sponsor indicated. Projects will not be prioritized without Sponsor approval of the business case. You will be notified when approval to move forward occurs.

fields.name: displayTextStakeholderDepartment
fields.fieldText: Select the departments that are required to implement your request. These departments may or may not receive a direct benefit, but work is required from them. Hold the Ctrl key to select multiple departments

fields.name: ProjectBacklogWorkstreamDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Select applicable categories below and provide quantifiable benefits for the {!Loop_Impacted_Workstreams.Name} workstream along with your degree of confidence in the number (is this number accurate and attainable?). 

 

You must enter information for at least one benefit in order to continue

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimated Annual Hours Saved and Increased Efficiencies Confidence % fields cannot be blank and must be greater than 0
validationRule.formulaExpression: IF({!Workstream_Increase_Efficiencies} = false && ({!Workstream_Estimated_Annual_Hours_Saved} < 1 || ISBLANK({!Workstream_Estimated_Annual_Hours_Saved})) && ({!Workstream_Efficiencies_Confidence} < 1 || ISBLANK({!Workstream_Efficiencies_Confidence})),true, IF({!Workstream_Increase_Efficiencies} = true && ({!Workstream_Estimated_Annual_Hours_Saved} < 1 || ISBLANK({!Workstream_Estimated_Annual_Hours_Saved})),false, IF({!Workstream_Increase_Efficiencies} = true && ({!Workstream_Efficiencies_Confidence} < 1 || ISBLANK({!Workstream_Efficiencies_Confidence})),false,true ) ) )

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimated Annual Hours Saved and Increased Efficiencies Confidence % fields cannot be blank and must be greater than 0

fields.name: Workstream_EfficienciesExplanations
fields.fieldText: How did you arrive at this number?

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimated Annual Hours Saved and Increased Efficiencies Confidence % fields cannot be blank and must be greater than 0
The Estimated Annual Cost Reduction and Cost Reduction Confidence % fields cannot be blank and must be greater than 0

fields.name: Workstream_CostReductionsExplanations
fields.fieldText: How did you arrive at this number?

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimated Annual Cost Reduction and Cost Reduction Confidence % fields cannot be blank and must be greater than 0

fields.name: TechTeamDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Does your project require work from The CBS (Corporate Business Systems) Team?

fields.name: WorkstreamDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select the Hospitality workstream(s) that will receive a cost reduction or efficiency savings benefit as a result of your request. You will be required to enter the benefits for each workstream that you have selected on the next screens of the wizard. If there are no workstreams that will receive these benefits, do not select any and click Next.
